Bug_reports.Title: Invalid password link sent to email
Bug_reports.Description: The link for setting the user password that is sent upon registration is broken, this making the whole registration process impossible
Bug_reports.Author: Ruslan Khrebtov

Steps to reproduce.three: Click on the link that is sent by email

Bug_reports.Expected result: The User should be brought to a 'New Password'
Bug_reports.Actual result: The User recieves an invalid password link
Bug_reports.Attachments: Here must be link to google drive
